column4: hello i have a little question... :) I need to add ".tor_aliases" to the bashrc file, but i find 2 one is /etc/bash.bashrc  and the other is /usr/share/base-file/dot.bashrc, what is the file i should add the line ".tor_aliases"  ??? thx in advance
it would be in your home directory. you need to show hidden files
you don't really need a howto; just fill in the questions in the wizard and it'll hook you up. Using it is almost too close to outlook
